sentences.sentence: He was released on bail pending committal proceedings.
The doctor was non-committal about when I could drive again.
sentences.translation: 关于我何时可以再开车的问题，医生没有表态。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Hall is non-committal about the number of jobs that the development corporation has created.
sentences.translation: 霍尔先生对开发公司已创造的岗位数量含糊其词。
